Verses: 1 pinbu, Palingaippola Thelivaana Jeevaththanneerulla Suththamaana Nadhi Dhevanum Aattukkuttiyaanavarum Irukkira Singaasanaththilirundhu Purappattuvarugiradhai Enakkuk Kaanbiththaan.

2 nagaraththu Veedhiyin Maththiyilum, Nadhiyin Irukaraiyilum, Panniranduvidhamaana Kanigalaiththarum Jeevavirutcham Irundhadhu, Adhu Maathandhorum Than Kaniyaik Kodukkum; Andha Virutchaththin Ilaigal Janangal Aarokkiyamadaigiradharku Edhuvaanavaigal.
3 ini Oru Saabamumiraadhu. Dhevanum Aattukkuttiyaanavarum Irukkira Singaasanam Adhilirukkum.
4 avarudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Avaraich Seviththu, Avarudaiya Samugaththaith Tharisippaargal; Avarudaiya Naamam Avargaludaiya Netrigalil Irukkum.
5 ange Iraakkaalamiraadhu; Vilakkum Sooriyanudaiya Velichchamum Avargalukku Venduvadhillai; Dhevanaagiya Karththare Avargalmel Piragaasippaar. Avargal Sadhaakaalangalilum Arasaaluvaargal.

6 pinbu, Avar Ennai Nokki: Indhavasanangal Unmaiyum Saththiyamumaanavaigal. Seekkiramaaich Sambavikkavendiyavaigalaith Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkuk Kaanbikkumporuttu, Parisuththa Theerkkadharisigalin Karththaraagiya Dhevanaanavar Thammudaiya Thoodhanai Anuppinaar.
7 idho, Seekkiramaai Varugiren; Indhap Pusthagaththilulla Theerkkadharisana Vasanangalaik Kaikkollugiravan Baakkiyavaan Endraar.
8 yovaanaagiya Naane Ivaigalaik Kandum Kettum Irundhen. Naan Kettuk Kandapodhu, Ivaigalai Enakkuk Kaanbiththa Thoodhanai Vanangumpadi Avan Paadhaththil Vizhundhen.

9 adharku Avan: Nee Ippadich Seyyaadhapadikkup Paar; Unnodum Un Sagodhararodum Theerkkadharisigalodum, Indhap Pusthagaththin Vasanangalaik Kaikkollugiravargalodungooda Naanum Oru Oozhiyakkaaran; Dhevanaith Thozhudhukol Endraan.
10 pinnum, Avar Ennai Nokki: Indhap Pusthagaththilulla, Theerkkadharisana Vasanangalai Muththiraipodavendaam; Kaalam Sameebamaayirukkiradhu.
11 aniyaayanjeygiravan Innum Aniyaayanjeyyattum; Asuththamaayirukkiravan Innum Asuththamaayirukkattum; Needhiyullavan Innum Needhiseyyattum; Parisuththamullavan Innum Parisuththamaakattum.
12 idho, Seekkiramaai Varugiren; Avanavanudaiya Kiriyaigalinpadi Avanavanukku Naan Alikkum Balan Ennodekooda Varugiradhu.
13 naan Albaavum Omegaavum, Aadhiyum Andhamum, Mundhinavarum Pindhinavarumaayirukkiren.
14 jeevavirutchaththinmel Adhigaaramullavargalaavadharkum, Vaasalgal Vazhiyaai Nagaraththirkul Piravesippadharkum Avarudaiya Karpanaigalinpadi Seygiravargal Baakkiyavaangal.
15 naaigalum, Sooniyakkaararum, Vibasaarakkaararum, Kolaipaadhagarum, Vikkirakaaraadhanaikkaararum, Poiyai Virumbi Adhinpadi Seygira Yaavarum Purampe Iruppaargal.

16 sabaigalil Ivaigalai Ungalukkuch Saatchiyaaga Arivikkumpadikku Yesuvaagiya Naan En Thoodhanai Anuppinen. Naan Thaaveedhin Verum Sandhadhiyum, Piragaasamulla Vidivelli Natchaththiramumaayirukkiren Endraar.
17 aaviyum Manavaattiyum Vaa Engiraargal; Ketkiravanum Vaa Enbaanaaga; Thaagamaayirukkiravan Varakkadavan; Viruppamullavan Jeevaththanneerai Ilavasamaai Vaangikkollakkadavan.

18 indhap Pusthagaththilulla Theerkkadharisana Vasanangalaik Ketkira Yaavarukkum Naan Saatchiyaaga Echcharikkiradhaavadhu: Oruvan Ivaigalode Edhaiyaagilum Koottinaal, Indhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkira Vaadhaigalai Dhevan Avanmel Koottuvaar.

19 oruvan Indhath Theerkkadharisana Pusthagaththin Vasanangalilirundhu Edhaiyaagilum Eduththuppottaal, Jeevapusthagaththilirundhum, Parisuththa Nagaraththilirundhum Indhap Pusthagaththil Ezhudhappattavaigalilirundhum, Avanudaiya Pangai Dhevan Eduththuppoduvaar.
20 ivaigalaich Saatchiyaaga Arivikkiravar: Meyyaagave Naan Seekkiramaai Varugiren Engiraar. Aamen,karththaraagiya Yesuve, Vaarum.
21 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesu Kiristhuvin Kirubai Ungal Anaivarodungooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
